nodes.text: Aar was a planet in the Aar system of the Nijune sector, part of the Outer Rim Territories. It was homeworld to the Aar'aa species, reptilian sentients often employed as enforcers by the Hutts, a species known for its many crime lords.
Aar was first mentioned in the 1997 novel The Paradise Snare, written by A. C. Crispin. The Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion placed the Aar system in grid square N-5.
